kanthawa samiyata pawasa aththe bhuthayaku pamina thamawa ussa wisikala bawaya.pasuwa waidya parikshanayakata kanthawa yomu kala wita sathya siddhiya heli kirimata kanthawata siduwu bawa hulugalle mahatha kiya.ema siddhiyen pasu gris yaka namathi prabandhayak aarambha wu bawa hethema penwa deyi.mewani katakathawalata ha mithyawalata norawatena lesa hethema illimak karayi.janathawa nomaga yawannanta erehiwa waha nithimaya piyawara ganna bawa da lakshman hulugalle mahatha pawasiya.me athara pereda (21) puththalama pradeshaye athiwu ghathanaya ha paharadim siddhi pilibanda soya balima sandaha polispathi en. ke. ilangakon mahatha eeye (22) dahawal ema pradeshayata giyeya.
